core_principles: Density is Data: No wasted pixels.
Visible Systems: Show the grid, show the skeleton.
Input Precision: Controls must feel tactile and mechanical.
Cyber-Industrial: Dark backgrounds, neon functional accents.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Hero text

code.usage: Code editor, Terminal, Pin names, MAC addresses, Hash IDs

visual_enhancers.grid_background: background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #27272a 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, #27272a 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 40px 40px; mask-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, black 10%, black 90%, transparent);
visual_enhancers.scanlines: background: linear-gradient(rgba(18, 16, 16, 0) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 50%), linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.06), rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.02), rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.06)); background-size: 100% 2px, 3px 100%;
visual_enhancers.glass_panel: background: rgba(18, 18, 18, 0.7); backdrop-filter: blur(12px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);

dashboard_grid.rules: Maximize screen usage. No large white/black spaces.

pin_configurator.layout: Two-pane split. Left: Visual Chip (Canvas/SVG). Right: Configuration Panel (Form).
pin_configurator.interaction: Click pin -> Open Popover -> Select Function.

buttons.classes: rounded-none border border-primary/50 bg-primary/10 hover:bg-primary/20 text-primary font-mono uppercase tracking-widest text-xs h-9 px-4 transition-all

inputs.classes: rounded-none border-b border-border bg-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 font-mono

pin_visualizer.description: Render a QFN32 package (square, 8 pins per side). Pins must be interactive buttons.

code_editor.options: minimap: { enabled: false }, fontSize: 13, fontFamily: 'JetBrains Mono'

terminal.style: bg-terminal-bg border-t border-border p-2 font-mono text-xs text-green-400 overflow-y-auto h-48
terminal.content: Must look like a real shell. Use 'xterm' library or simple scrollable div with typed-out effect.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic gradients. Use flat, deep colors or subtle noise textures.
DO NOT center text unless it is a hero title.
ALL interactive elements must have hover states (brightness-125 or border-color change).
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all data values (IPs, MACs, Pin Numbers).
Charts must use 'recharts' with the custom cyber-palette.

setup: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors and font families.
Import the Google Fonts in index.css.
implementation_order: 1. Setup Base Styles (Fonts, Global CSS variables for colors).
2. Create Layout Shell (Sidebar, Header, Main Content Area).
